definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: Bab. name given to [[חֲנַנְיׇה]], one of Daniel’s comrades Da 1:7 (form and mng. dub.; Dl (cf. COT Dr) Šudur-Aku, command of Aku; Jen:Th LZ 1895, 328 thinks Pers. [*Khšatraka]; Kohler:ZA iv (1889), 50 conj. [[מרדך]], so Wkl:Altor. Forsch. iii. 47. 57 Zim:KAT 3. 396).
